channel.title: Webdev on Daniel Michaels
channel.description: Recent content in Webdev on Daniel Michaels

item.title: Flask, forms and http requests
item.description: Flask, Forms and HTTP Requests Preface This week I have been building a small webapp that leverage’s an external API to populate values in the user pages. And it pains me to say that I spent a silly length of time debugging what was a rather easy problem. The webapp uses Flask, jinja2 templates and the fuelwatcher API. The issue started when trying to institute a search bar that allows the user to select a series of parameters.
